Convert hex color to plotly RGBA format

hex_to_rgba.Rd

Converts a hex color to plotly-compatible RGBA format with specified alpha.

Usage

hex_to_rgba(hex_color, alpha = 1)

Arguments

hex_color

(`character(1)`)
Hex color code (e.g., "#1f77b4").

alpha

(`numeric(1)`)
Alpha transparency value between 0 and 1.

Value

A character string in RGBA format.

On this page

Developed by Marc Becker, Daniel Schalk, Lukas Burk, Manuel Helmerichs.
